Up for sale is my 65 bus that I have owned for over 6 years. In this time I have fully restored it and enjoyed every minute of it!
It was imported into the UK from Holland back in 2003 so its a LHD. It was a standard bus until I bought it then the modifying began. I sent it down to a company called Type2detectives to renew all mechanical components including slamming it with a big power engine being custom built to my requirements. After all the work was complete I used the bus for a good while before I decided to complete a bodywork resto on it. It took about 18 months before it was fully painted inside and out and turned out far better than I even imagined it too! After building it all back together I built a custom interior to suit our family needs then sent it away to be retrimmed. For the last 2 years we have used it for camping trips and showing at VW show all over the UK. It has won 5 trophies in this time and has been enjoyed by all the family! In January this year I had the engine and gearbox rebuilt by Matt Balls (ex T2D) so they have only covered 3000klms since then. He also fitted a propex heating system too.
Before the engine and box rebuild I used it for the odd Drag day where it ran constand 16's 1/4mile times so its a very quick bus and will easily keep up with most things on the road. For family camping I have fitted a RnR 3/4 bed in the back and a kids hammock in the front. It has a twin hob for cooking too. I built this bus to keep and never thought I'd sell it but that's has changed!!!! It has an independent agreed valuation of £28500 on it and including buying it all those years ago I have spent way more than £30k on it! I have a few extras that can be sold with the bus, thermo screens, Kyham quick erect awning etc.......RWC 598 will NOT be sold with the bus, I will reregister it for the new owner!
Full build thread here......... viewtopic.php?f=8&t=44118 Everything in there!
